title: UPDATE FAILED
body:
So i just bought my Computer ( Window 10 ). And i started to download league of legend. Suddenly the Update Failed screen popped up at 1 Files Scanned.
I tried everything on internet and it still doesn't work. Can anyone have any idea that can help me fix this solution . 

this is what is said 

                                               Update Failed:
                        Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

replies.body: That error that early on suggest a security issue that's blocking the patcher from scanning your game files.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix it up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
